CustomField.description: Indicates whether a pickup/delivery can be made from either side or same side of street as the location. Populated only for customer booking locations where the address is captured via an AME lookup. Possible values as returned by AME are 'SAME', 'ANY' or 'UNKNOWN'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the site can be accessed from either side or same side of street as the location.
CustomField.label: Side Of Street Code
